title: Just a gal looking for new people to play with!
body:
Hey I am silver 5 and I'm looking for some people to Duo with or dynamic queue with.. You can be bronze silver gold I will welcome you all :p
Hope to hear from you

replies.body: I do that because I am tired of getting into curse calls or Skype calls and people get all surprised I'm a girl and go through the whole I didn't know you were a girl wow your name doesn't sound like a girl and all that crap it is boring and annoying

> [{quoted}](name=Runyoucleverboy,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=WWcE8wpi,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-04-19T22:57:07.094+0000)
>
> I do that because I am tired of getting into curse calls or Skype calls and people get all surprised I'm a girl and go through the whole I didn't know you were a girl wow your name doesn't sound like a girl and all that crap it is boring and annoying

#firstworldproblems :^)
I feel like i have heard this somewhere
why say your a girl? like whats the point?

> [{quoted}](name=Navillus omega ,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=WWcE8wpi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-19T22:42:54.186+0000)
>
> why say your a girl? like whats the point?

Probably just some dude that needs attention.
heya still looking for someone to play with?
If you don't want to duo that's fine I'm over it

> [{quoted}](name=The Loveless,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=WWcE8wpi,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-19T22:56:01.464+0000)
>
> Nah u feed too much

I really don't care if we duoed and had a bad game I'm over it maybe you should try to get over it
Hmm,  You clearly like doctor who (as do I since I got the reference).  But I'm plat so...
